metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3992 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.5.3 allowremote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1)entity parameter in an update action to user/fiche.php or (2) sortorderparameter to user/group/index.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3992` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.4+dfsg2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.4+dfsg2-1').
